channel.title: Is there any way to have a client like runescape with no cache download
channel.description: title says it all so is it possible ? like just like runescape as if i host cache.zip or sumtin

item.title: Is there any way to have a client like runescape with no cache download
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

I’m not sure if Jagex still does this, but in the pre-503 era, they had something called the “JAGGRAB” protocol, which basically compared the current cache files with ones on the server, and if there was a mismatch, it sent back the correct files.

I believe Hyperion has one with it.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there any way to have a client like runescape with no cache download
